headline: Trump Signs Order Targeting Ticket Scalpers and Fees
summary: The order calls for greater price transparency and stronger enforcement of unfair or anticompetitive ticket resale practices.

headline: PVH Corp, Live Nation: After-hours movers
summary: Here are some of the stocks on the move in after-hours trading on Monday. PVH (PVH) shares jumped on upbeat fiscal 2026 guidance. Live Nation (LYV) shares are in focus following reports that President Trump will assign an executive order targeting ticket scalpers. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here.

headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Moderna Stock Plunges After Resignation of FDA Vaccine Official
summary: The S&P 500 gained 0.6% on Monday, March 31, boosted by an afternoon rally even as investors brace for the planned onset of reciprocal tariffs later this week.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Moderna Stock Plunges After Resignation of FDA Vaccine Official

headline: With Kid Rock at his side, Trump signs executive order targeting ticket scalping
summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -President Donald Trump on Monday signed an executive order aimed at protecting fans from "exploitative ticket scalping" and reforming the U.S. live entertainment ticketing industry.  Trump signed the directive in the Oval Office, with singer Kid Rock standing next to him in a patriotic American flag-themed outfit.  Kid Rock said ticket scalpers' use of bots to buy large numbers of tickets at face value and then selling them for a profit is a big problem in the industry.
